question: Match the locations of ports labelled as A, B, C and D in the given map with the names of those ports and select the correct answer using the codes given below the names of the ports : Names of Ports: 1. Kakinada 2. Karwar 3. Mangalore 4. Tuticorin 5. Veraval Codes:
explanation:
Veraval is a municipality and the headquarters of Gir Somnath district in the Indian state of Gujarat. It is 6 km from Somnath. It is also known for the hub of fishing industries in India.
Karwar port is located at Baithkol, Karwar Bay in Karnataka. Hills and coastal islands make the port a natural harbour, sheltered from the Arabian sea.
V. O. Chidambaranar Port Trust, formerly Tuticorin Port Trust, is one of the 12 major ports in India. It was declared to be a major port on 11 July 1974. It is second-largest port in Tamil Nadu and fourth-largest container terminal in India. After Sethusamudram Shipping Canal Project V. O.
Kakinada Port is located at Kakinada off the east coast of India in Andhra Pradesh. It is 170 km (106 mi) south of Visakhapatnam Port.
